text:
League 1
Lille: "I think we're going to be in the woods on the 31st!"
To return to the two goals conceded by his team against OM (2-1), Christophe Galtier preferred ironically in a press conference.
03 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Hugo Deloraine



A goal of Sanson following a scramble of Maignan then a CSC Gabriel. The goals conceded by Lille against Marseille (victory 2-1 Marseille) are not the most beautiful to see! The Lille coach Christophe Galtier preferred to make a joke in a press conference right after the match.




"At this level, we can not take this kind of goals there"




Lille + 15 ğŸ“·Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"We suspected that the OM was going to have a different face, very aggressive and very intense, and we did not know how to answer that, we were quickly caught up in the rhythm, the intensity, the duels. has had very few favorable situations in the depths to play forwards, Marseille deserves his victory, at least we do not deserve to win, let go the former coach of ASSE before going on. I think we're going to be a betting bird on the 31st, and on the two goals we're taking, it's ... At that level, we can not take that kind of goals. very important faults in front of a team that put us under pressure, to prevent us from playing. "
Â Mike Maignan: all information about the player
